solution_line_template: This many baby turtles are in the ocean: {total_turtles} / {fraction_denominator} = <<{total_turtles}/{fraction_denominator}={turtles_in_ocean}>>{turtles_in_ocean} turtles.
This many baby turtles are still on the sand: {total_turtles} - {turtles_in_ocean} = <<{total_turtles}-{turtles_in_ocean}={turtles_on_sand}>>{turtles_on_sand} turtles.
